message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.NE 

This paper is related to Natural Language Processing (NLP) and Machine Translation (MT), which are subfields of Computer Science. Specifically, it deals with the preprocessing stage of Statistical Machine Translation (SMT) system, which falls under the category of Computational Linguistics (cs.CL). The proposed approach involves the use of rules for better reordering, which can be seen as a form of Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) and Machine Learning (cs.LG) techniques. The evaluation metrics used in the paper, such as BLEU and NIST, are commonly used in Information Retrieval (cs.IR) and Natural Language Generation (cs.NE) tasks.
